description: Styles for the Tic Tac Toe interactive platform frontend, defining colors, layout, and responsive design.

classes.name: loading-spinner-container
classes.description: A container for the loading spinner that centers its content.

classes.name: loading-spinner
classes.description: A circular loading spinner that rotates to indicate loading state.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with center-aligned content.

classes.name: error-message
classes.description: A styled container for displaying error messages.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: The main container for the game layout, adjusting its content display.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Container for the game board elements.

classes.name: board
classes.description: Grid layout for arranging the squares in the game.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Individual square of the Tic Tac Toe board with hover and active states.

classes.name: game-info
classes.description: Container for displaying game state information.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Displays current game status such as 'X's turn' or 'Winner: X'.

classes.name: player-form
classes.description: Form for players to enter their names.

classes.name: button
classes.description: Styled buttons used throughout the game interface.

classes.name: history
classes.description: Container for displaying game history items.

classes.name: game-mode-selector
classes.description: Selector for choosing different game modes.

classes.name: winner
classes.description: Styled indication of the winning player.
